section.title:
tax classes
master list of Tax Classes
section.para: Tax Classes are used as a grouping mechanism for structuring of cumulative taxes. Can also be used for reporting purposes such as summarized historical reporting and subtotaling on forms. To access the master list of Tax Classes, select the "Tax Classes" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Tax Classes" screen displays information on all existing Tax Classes.
